biotools.summary: Web server that could predict methylation sites in proteins. With the assistance of FKNN, the highlight of this tool is to employ amino acid sequence features extracted by incorporating the sequence evolution information into PseAAC via a grey system model (Grey-PSSM).

bioschemas.name: iCataly-PseAAC
bioschemas.summary: Web server that could predict methylation sites in proteins. With the assistance of FKNN, the highlight of this tool is to employ amino acid sequence features extracted by incorporating the sequence evolution information into PseAAC via a grey system model (Grey-PSSM).
